fields.name: Passives:
fields.value: - Suitor: Gain the Suitor’s Quarters Room benefit. [Activates D2]

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Passages: Visit another Room on top of your regular Room that isn’t listed in available Rooms for the Night phase. Cannot be Role Specific Rooms or Voting Rooms. [2 uses, 4 CD, Unique, Unlocks D2]
- Keymaster: Pick a Room to be available to select in the next Day phase. [1 use, Unique, Unlocks D3]
- Rummage: Pick a card type. Gain a random non-Special card of that card type immediately. [Infinite, 2 CD]
